name: Sea Captain 2016
description:
You're the proud new owner of a rusty fishing boat. It's not much right now, but at least it's got a fishing rod! Become a real sea captain by exploring the open and endless sea, catching fish, shrimp, and crabs. Sell your catch to upgrade your equipment and boat. Deliver mail between ports, and find hidden treasures and artifacts! Watch out for the whales!

- Explore a completely open world with gorgeous scenery and weather
- Catch fish, shrimp, and crabs!
- Sell your catch to upgrade your boat, rods, nets, and crab traps
- Deliver mail between ports to earn extra
- Find hidden treasures and artifacts!
